name: Iron Harvest (itch)
description:
RULES:

  1. Build robots.
  2. Plant iron plants.
  3. Grow iron plants.
  4. Get spare parts from fruits.
  5. Repeat.

MAIN PROBLEM: The energy of the ship’s reactor is finite!

MAIN GOAL: Collect all the spaceship parts to get off the planet and save humanity. Ship parts also grow on plants.
